snippet: A woman disguised in scrubs was caught trying to steal a newborn girl from a Southern California hospital after sensors attached to the baby alerted employees, the police said.
abstract: Woman disguised in nurse's scrubs is caught trying to steal a newborn girl from a Southern California hospital after sensors attached to the baby alerted employees.
lead_paragraph: A woman disguised in scrubs was caught trying to steal a newborn girl from a Southern California hospital after sensors attached to the baby alerted employees, the police said.

headline.main: California: Woman Posing as Nurse Accused of Trying to Steal Baby
headline.print_headline: California: Woman Posing as Nurse Accused of Trying To Steal Baby
